short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linking Wikipedia articles to Cochrane reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension activates when browsing Wikipedia. If the Wikipedia article which is being viewed is classified as a disease, then a list of relevant Cochrane reviews will be displayed.
